headline: weather advisory in effect
description:
Winter weather travel advisory in effect for this afternoon and evening.

What:
Total snowfall accumulations up to 10 cm.
Reduced visibility in snow.

When:
Continuing through late this evening.

Additional information:
An Alberta clipper will bring snow over the area. The heaviest snowfall is expected this afternoon and will taper to light flurries overnight. Areas north of Earlton may receive slightly less snow.

###

Travel may be hazardous due to sudden changes in the weather.

For road conditions and other traveller information from the Ministry of Transportation, visit https://www.ontario.ca/511, https://www.twitter.com/511Ontario, or call 5-1-1.

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
instruction: Be prepared to adjust your driving with changing road conditions. If visibility is reduced while driving, slow down, watch for tail lights ahead and be prepared to stop.
